A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It wasn't terrible\, it wasn't amazing\, it was just fine. I'll probably have to see it again to really understand how I feel about it and even then\, I think I'll have to revise this after Episode IX is released. Since this is the middle of this trilogy\, I think Episode IX could make my feelings on this one improve or decline. I won't spoil anything specifically\, but I will say that it had a lot of moments that made me say \"ummm...what?\".
